attributes.action: Hear the BritishCitizens views on how government are breaching our HumanRights
attributes.background: British people feel unsafe in our country and the government should be protecting us not putting us in danger . Hear the British citizens views on how we feel with uncontrolled immigration including people who believe rape of women and children is acceptable and killing of people of different faiths

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
